EmailTemplate.description: Adaptive Insights Partner Community registration (this is for Partner prospects who register but encountered an error)
EmailTemplate.name: 1A. Partner Community Registration Template Failed
EmailTemplate.subject: Adaptive Insights Partner Community Registration Error
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.Name},
Web to lead form failed!
Adaptive to provide content.
If you need any assistance during this time, please connect with us directly at partners@adaptiveinsights.com
The Adaptive Insights Channel Team
